org.ingatan.data
Class FlexiQuestion

java.lang.Object
  org.ingatan.data.FlexiQuestion
All Implemented Interfaces:
IQuestion
public class FlexiQuestion
extends java.lang.Object
implements IQuestion

This is an implementation of the IQuestion interface. The flexi-question type is of the standard Ingatan 2.0 type. It has a text field for the question text, a text field for the answer text (which includes answer fields) and a text field for the post-answer text. This class encapsulates the text data and question meta-data.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Thomas Everingham

Field Detail

questionText

protected java.lang.String questionText
Question field text. This is rich text in a HTML-style markup. The RichTextArea class is able to produce this text based on its content, and also parse this markup in to reproduce the styled text.

answerText

protected java.lang.String answerText
Answer field text. This is rich text in a HTML-style markup. The RichTextArea class is able to produce this text based on its content, and also parse this markup in to reproduce the styled text. Note that the answer text field mainly holds answer-fields that the user has inserted. These answer fields are components which have settings that the user can adjust. The answer field components serialize themselves. The rich text field serialises them in the form
[component tag component="name"] text the component generated here, parsed later by the component [/component tag]

postAnswerText

protected java.lang.String postAnswerText
Post-answer text. This is rich text that the user sees after submitting his or her answer during quiz mode. This is rich text in a HTML-style markup. The RichTextArea class is able to produce this text based on its content, and also parse this markup in to reproduce the styled text.

usePostAnswerText

protected boolean usePostAnswerText
This sets whether or not the post-answer text field is to be used. If not then the text field will be hidden from view. This is altered through the use of a checkbox.

marksAwarded

protected long marksAwarded
The sum of marks that have been awarded over all the times this question has been asked. The overall correctness of this question can be calculated as marksAwarded/marksAvailable.

marksAvailable

protected long marksAvailable
The sum of marks that have been available over all the times this question has been asked. The overall correctness of this question can be calculated as marksAwarded/marksAvailable. The reason this field is saved is that the user may wish to change the number of marks allocated for a particular answer field, without affecting the correctness value acheived thus far.

timesAsked

protected int timesAsked
The number of times this question has been asked during a quiz.

parentLibrary

protected java.lang.String parentLibrary
The libraryID of the library that this question belongs to.

Method Detail

getAnswerText

public java.lang.String getAnswerText()
Gets the answer text for this question. The text may be formatted with a basic markup that is parsed/interpretted by the RichTextArea class.

Returns:
the answer text for this question.

setAnswerText

public void setAnswerText(java.lang.String answerText)
Sets the answer text for this question.

Parameters:
answerText - the new answer text.

getMarksAvailable

public long getMarksAvailable()
Gets the number of marks that have been made available to the user over all times this question has been asked. This is the maximum number of marks that can have been awarded so far.

Returns:
the number of marks that have been available to win during quiz time over all times this question has been asked.

getCorrectness

public float getCorrectness()
Returns the overall all-time correctness of this Flexi Question over all the times it has been asked. Equivalent to getMarksAwarded() / getMarksAvailable().

Returns:
the ratio of marks that have been awarded to the marks that have been available.

setMarksAvailable

public void setMarksAvailable(long marksAvailable)
Sets the number of marks that have been made available to win during quiz time over all times this question has been asked. This method is used to update the value.

Parameters:
marksAvailable - new number of marks that have been available.

getMarksAwarded

public long getMarksAwarded()
Gets the total number of marks that have been awarded during quiz time to answers of this question. The correctness of the question can be found as marksAwarded divided by marksAvailable.

Returns:
the total number of marks awarded for answers to this question.

setMarksAwarded

public void setMarksAwarded(long marksAwarded)
Sets the number of marks that have been awarded to answers of this question during quiz time. This method is used to update the value.

Parameters:
marksAwarded - the new number of marks that have been awarded.

isUsingPostAnswerText

public boolean isUsingPostAnswerText()
Checks whether or not post-answer text is to be used for this question. Even if post-answer text is not being used, the post answer text may not be empty, as it may have been used previously and not deleted.

Returns:
true if post-answer text is being used.

setUsePostAnswerText

public void setUsePostAnswerText(boolean usePostAnswerText)
Sets whether or not post-answer text should be used for this question.

Parameters:
usePostAnswerText - true if post-answer text should be used.
